author: AP
title: Paralympians adapt to new challenges as virus spreads
description: Athletes and coaches are trying to adapt after the Paralympics were delayed because of the coronavirus pandemic
content:
DÜSSELDORF, Germany (AP) — Sam Grewe could end up missing the start of medical school to go to the Paralympics, and that will be fine with him.
With the games postponed until 2021, the Notre Dame student and Paralympic silver medalist in the high jump will f… [+3833 chars]
